name: FamalyUA Light Theme
description: Дизайн для сайту  FamalyUA в світлих тонах.
css:
/* i really want this to be global */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);.head{background:#3FBDFF;box-shadow:0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.3);height:50px}.logo{top:5px}.titleRadius{background:#f6fcff;color:#3FBDFF;position:relative;border-radius:2px 2px 0 0;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;margin:10px 4px 0;padding:15px;font-weight:400}.block4{background:#f6fcff;color:#3FBDFF;position:relative;border-radius:2px 2px 0 0;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;margin:1px 4px 0}a.title_a_hover{background:#3FBDFF;color:#FFF;padding:5px;font-weight:400;border-radius:3px;border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px}.title{background:#fff;font-weight:400;color:#3FBDFF;padding:15px;font-size:15px;position:relative;border-radius:2px 2px 0 0;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;margin:10px 4px 0}.err{background:#FFF;border:1px solid #FF9898;padding:8px;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);margin:10px 4px 0}.input{padding:10px;margin:4px 0;font-family:Arial, sans-serif;outline:0;border-radius:3px;display:block;width:98%;border-left:0;border-top:0;border-right:0;border-bottom:2px solid #3FBDFF;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)}.button2{background:#3FBDFF;color:#FFF;padding:6px;border:0;font-weight:400;border-radius:3px;width:auto;cursor:pointer}.block2{background:#FFF}.profil_avatar{width:150px;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;height:150px;margin:20px 0;left:-30%;top:30px;border-radius:100px;position:relative}.profil_name{color:#FFF;text-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);top:-120px;left:-10px;position:relative;font-family:sans-serif;font-size:15px}.profil .visit{color:#FFF;font-size:15px;margin-top:5px;margin-left:-110px}.status{background:rgb(255, 255, 255);display:block;border-radius:3px;padding:7px;width:95%;position:relative;margin:7px;top:-55px;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;border:0;font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px}.profil_button a.button2{padding:10px;margin:6px;display:inline-block;border-radius:8%}#menuHead{position:absolute;right:10px;top:10px}body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#3FBDFF}body::-webkit-scrollbar-track,Pseudo ::scrollbar-track elementbody::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:rgba(63, 189, 255, 0.29)}a{text-decoration:none;color:#3FBDFF;margin:0;padding:0}.profil_button{border-bottom:1px solid #3FBDFF}.panel a{color:gray;text-align:center;padding:12px 0;display:inline-block;width:30%;height:35px}.panel a:hover{text-decoration:none;border-bottom:3px solid #3FBDFF;padding-bottom:9px}.preview{max-width:560px;max-height:560px;margin:0 0 0 -9px;padding:5px}.foot a{color:#3FBDFF;margin:0 3px;display:inline-block}.button_a{background:#3FBDFF;color:#fff;font-weight:400;font-size:15px;padding:10px;display:block;text-align:center;border-radius:3px;box-shadow:-1px -4px 7px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);border-bottom:solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05) 1px;margin:10px 4px 0}
